snippet: The skills of a small, elite group of American soldiers, including Green Berets, are useful in a wide range of tasks if successfully integrated with conventional units.
abstract: United States military is planning broader role for Special Forces soldiers, including Green Berets, in both war and peace operations.
lead_paragraph: The skills of a small, elite group of American soldiers, including Green Berets, are useful in a wide range of tasks if successfully integrated with conventional units.

headline.seo: Military Plans Broader Role for Special Operations
headline.main: Military Sees Broader Role for Special Operations Forces, in Peace and War
headline.print_headline: Military Sees Broader Role for Special Operations Forces, in Peace and War

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
